Uses of Class
com.tversity.airflinger.sdk.android.Player

Packages that use Player
com.tversity.airflinger.sdk.android Classes that provide the main functionality of the SDK, allowing "Flinging" of media to target devices. 
 

Uses of Player in com.tversity.airflinger.sdk.android

          Gets a list of all discovered player devices.
